ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New messages
ygData.msgSnippet: No you re not missing anything.  For most people 3 songs is all they can reliably medly.  I medly four all the time (3 for dragons/planes). Basically if you ve
ygData.messageBody:
No you're not missing anything. For most people 3 songs is all they can
reliably medly. I medly four all the time (3 for dragons/planes).
Basically if you've got a good connection and a reasonably speedy system 4
songs is no problem in most situations (also have to have good reflexes ;)

Sing on ;) 4 songs is a POWERFUL combo if you can get it going.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 12:56 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New messages


> Okay, I know that the theory says that 3 songs should be optimized, but I
> have been weaving 4 when soloing out of a vague feeling that the total
> effect was most beneficial (at level 24-26 it's been DDD, CoD, Chains,
> Hymn). With the new DoT messages it appears that I can keep everything
going
> and the DoTs wear off as I am starting the new DoT. (I play on a P2 266
and
> 56K modem and this is still no problem most places). Am I missing
something
> still?
>
> Also, as I am sure people have found out, when grouping the group leader
> gets my DoT messages *laughs* probably not as intended...
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin, *DING!*27,Povar
>
>
>
